subject_checkboxgroup.name: SUBJECT
subject_checkboxgroup.description: Choose a subject for this success story. It will appear randomly on the relevant subject homepage / course page.

checkboxgroup.name: TARGET
checkboxgroup.description: Choose an audience for this news item.

copytext.name: INTRO
copytext.tag: Course information / company information / department information

copytext.name: QUOTE
copytext.description: Should be no more than 25 words. Will be used on the home page when featured.

cropimage.name: IMAGE
cropimage.description: JPG or GIF image: 440 pixels wide, flexible height, ideally 165 pixels high

dhtmltext.name: CONTENT
dhtmltext.description: Text formats: introductory text (Heading 3), headlines (Heading 4), paragraphs (Normal)

box.name: LINKS
box.tag: Optional internal or external links or file downloads

box.name: RELATED
box.description: Add related links or internal advertising to this page.
